title: How to Make Chocolate Banana Filling (for Cakes)

steps.headline: Combine the cocoa and sugar with 1 - 2 teaspoons of cream in a bowl.
Whip the remainder of the cream until it becomes stiff.
Mash the bananas.
steps.description: Add the mashed bananas to the cocoa mix.

steps.headline: Blend in the whipped cream gradually.
Use as cake filling.
steps.description: Spread it across the cake using a spatula.

text: Combine the cocoa and sugar with 1 - 2 teaspoons of cream in a bowl.  Mix together well.  Whip the remainder of the cream until it becomes stiff.  Mash the bananas. Add the mashed bananas to the cocoa mix. Blend in the whipped cream gradually.  Use as cake filling. Spread it across the cake using a spatula.
